org.modelio.api.modelio.model.scope

Class ElementScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.modelio.model.scope.ElementScope

  • public final class ElementScope
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates a scope definition for a command.

    A scope is composed of a metaclass and a stereotype. Both values are optional but at least one of these two fields must be provided.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElementScope

        public ElementScope(MClass metaclass,
                    boolean withSubClasses,
                    Stereotype stereotype,
                    boolean withSubStereotypes)
        A scope is composed of a metaclass and a stereotype.

        Both values are optional but at least one of these two fields must be provided.

        Parameters:
        metaclass - a metaclass. Might be null
        withSubClasses - whether or not metaclass inheritance should be considered for the check
        stereotype - a stereotype. Might be null
        withSubStereotypes - whether or not stereotype inheritance should be considered for the check
        Since:
        3.8

      • isMatching

        public final boolean isMatching(MObject e)
        Check that the given element matches the scope's metaclass/stereotype.
        Parameters:
        e - the element to check.
        Returns:
        true if the element matches the scope's metaclass/stereotype.
        Since:
        3.8
